fw.name: PrismaticMachiningInterfaces

class.name: ManufacturingPrismaticMachiningArea
class.abstract: ManufacturingPrismaticMachiningArea defines a set of properties and methods.

method.name: GetContourSide
method.abstract: Gets the side of one contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: GetGeometriesAquisitionMode
method.abstract: Gets the aquisition mode of one geometry of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: IsContourClosed
method.abstract: Return the status of one contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area : closed or open.

method.name: RemoveAllGeometry
method.abstract: Removes all the geometry of a specified type linked to a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: SetClosedContourSide
method.abstract: Sets the side of one closed contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: SetContourSide
method.abstract: Sets the side of one contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: SetGeometries
method.abstract: Sets or adds geometry in a collection of a specified type to a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: SetGeometry
method.abstract: Sets a geometry of a specified type to a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: SetOpenContourSide
method.abstract: Sets the side of one open contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: BottomType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Hardness Mode on Bottom of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: ContoursCount
method.abstract: Retreives the number of Contour of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: IslandsCount
method.abstract: Retreives the number of Island of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: TopType
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Hardness Mode on top of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Type of a Manufacturing Prismatic Machining Area.
